description: [Hildegard](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0601) was executed through an unsecure kubelet that allowed anonymous access to the victim environment.(Citation: Unit 42 Hildegard Malware)

external_references.description: Chen, J. et al. (2021, February 3). Hildegard: New TeamTNT Cryptojacking Malware Targeting Kubernetes. Retrieved April 5, 2021.
